dt-example.title: Language Options
dt-example.info:
This example demonstrates how to set the value of the following language properties:
* `-init language.searchBuilder.add` * `-init language.searchBuilder.condition` * `-init language.searchBuilder.clearAll` * `-init language.searchBuilder.deleteTitle` * `-init language.searchBuilder.data` * `-init language.searchBuilder.leftTitle` * `-init language.searchBuilder.logicAnd` * `-init language.searchBuilder.logicOr` * `-init language.searchBuilder.rightTitle` * `-init language.searchBuilder.title` * `-init language.searchBuilder.value`
